words.source: H1121 conj. waw + noun common masculine plural construct of בֵּן 'son'; KJV 'the sons of', ESV 'the sons of', NASB 'the sons of'
H5816 (עֻזִּיאֵל, 'Uzziel', meaning 'my strength is God'), proper noun masculine; KJV 'Uzziel', ESV 'Uzziel', NASB 'Uzziel'
H4332 (מִישָׁאֵל, 'Mishael', meaning 'who is what God is'), proper noun masculine; KJV 'Mishael', ESV 'Mishael', NASB 'Mishael'
H469 conj. waw + proper noun masculine (אֶלְצָפָן, 'Elzaphan', meaning 'God has protected'); KJV 'Elzaphan', ESV 'Elzaphan', NASB 'Elzaphan'
H5644 conj. waw + proper noun masculine (סִתְרִי, 'Sithri', meaning 'my protection'); KJV 'Zithri', ESV 'Sithri', NASB 'Sithri'
